overview: Dear Whore, Is breast size really the measure of a woman's worth? Wait. Never mind. Stupid question.  Dear Whore, Is anal sex the only effective form of bitch control?  Dear Whore, My dentist says sucking his cock helps fight the gum disease known as gingivitis. Could this be true?  Dear Whore, Is butt sex the new vaginal sex?
title: Dear Whore 2
